Submission Guidelines

General Paper format
Submitted papers must be no longer than 6 single-spaced pages in double column format with a font size no smaller than 10. The papers should adhere to the standard ACM conference proceedings format (https://sigmobile.org/mobicom/2018/files/sig-alternate-10pt.cls). All submissions must be in English.

Authors must register the abstract 1 week prior to the full paper submission.
Reviews will be single-blinded. Papers should neither have been published elsewhere nor being currently under review by another conference or journal.

Demo/Poster format
Demo and poster proposals will be published as part of the proceedings and must not be longer than 2 pages. For demos, an additional page must describe the precise setup and requirements. This page will not be published in the proceedings.

Submission Site
Please submit your papers in PDF format using the following paper submission website: https://chants2019.hotcrp.com

Camera Ready Guidelines
Camera Ready due date is August 18th.
Please check the camera ready submission guidelines here.
